property.name: attack
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Attack stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: defense
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Defense stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: specialAttack
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Special Attack stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: specialDefense
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Special Defense stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: speed
property.description: The Player's active Pokemon's Speed stat as calculated in battle (badge boosts and stat modifications included

property.name: textSpeed2
property.description: False+False = Fast, True+False = Mid, True+True = Slow

property.name: textSpeed3
property.description: False+False = Fast, True+False = Mid, True+True = Slow
